activities: Personal information that is transferred to PossibleNOW falls under one of the following scenarios: "Processor on Behalf of Customers" -- PossibleNOW assists businesses in the management of data by providing customized technology services and privacy preference solutions. PossibleNOW may receive information transferred from the EU or Switzerland to the United States as a processor on behalf of our customer. PossibleNOW does not own or control the information we process on behalf of our customer. Information is owned and controlled by PossibleNOW’s customer only. "Data Controller on Behalf of Customers" --PossibleNOW provides accurate data products designed to help marketers more successfully integrate and improve the accuracy of their customer information and reduce the operational costs of processing customer data. In this function, PossibleNOW acts as a data controller of the personal information contained in these information products. To the extent required by local law, PossibleNOW may act as the data controller with respect to personal information collected, processed and stored.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: Direct Marketing Association's Safe Harbor Program
recoursemech: Direct Marketing Association's (DMA) Safe Harbor Program
